author: Drago Prime
name: BenchmarkLeaderboard
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help CogName` to get the list of commands and their description.
short: Track benchmark scores across different categories
description: A cog that allows users to add and track benchmark scores, creating leaderboards for different performance metrics.
end_user_data_statement: Stores user IDs and their benchmark scores. Users can delete their data via the delete command.
